lead.p: toFixed â€” Returns a string representation of the specified Number object.

parameters.parameter: A number between 0 and 20 representing number of digits.

example.heading: toFixed example
example.code: var n = new Number(42.12345); console.log(n.toFixed()); // Will be the primitive string "42". console.log(n.toFixed(2)); // Will be the primitive string "42.12". console.log(n.toFixed(4)); // Will be the primitive string "42.1235". console.log(n.toFixed(6)); // Will be the primitive string "42.123450".
